name: Sunset Citrus Breeze
preparation: In a shaker, combine vodka, fresh orange juice, and lime juice. Fill with ice and shake well. Strain the mixture into a chilled highball glass filled with ice.
garnish: Orange slice and a lime wheel
backstory: Inspired by the vibrant colors and refreshment of a summer sunset, this drink combines the sweetness of orange juice with a zest of lime to capture the essence of summer.
